verses.verse: May <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> you in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%> May the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> set you up on <S%H7682>high,<s%>
<S%H7971>send<s%> you <S%H5828>help<s%> from the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> grant you <S%H5582>support<s%> from <S%H6726>Zion,<s%>
May He <S%H5414>grant<s%> you your <S%H3824>heart<s%>'s <S%H4390>desire,<s%> and fulfill all your <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>
We will <S%H7442>triumph<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> In the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God,<s%> we will set up our <S%H1713>banners.<s%> May Yahweh grant all your <S%H3068>requests.<s%>

Now I <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3467>saves<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> He will <S%H6030>answer<s%> him from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> with the <S%H3468>saving<s%> <S%H1369>strength<s%> of his right <S%H3225>hand.<s%>
Some trust in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and some in <S%H5483>horses,<s%> but we <S%H2142>trust<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
They are bowed <S%H3766>down<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> but we <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H5749>up,<s%> and stand upright.
